p: Since it has been well-established that body image awareness and general health perception affect the intensity and duration of pain for these women, trained specialists should promote a more holistic approach by integrating lifestyle changes into the management of primary dysmenorrhea. 62, 72, 73 Lifestyle alterations could benefit the overall health of these women and improve their Quality-of-Life. 74 Figure 2 comprises the aforementioned lifestyle focused approaches into the management of PD.
